meanings.sent1: The small, hoblike creature scurried across the forest floor.
meanings.sent2: The old, hoblike house had a cozy fireplace and wooden beams.
meanings.sent3: The hoblike figure in the shadows turned out to be a friendly gnome.
meanings.sent4: Her hoblike features made her the perfect fit for the role of a mischievous sprite.
meanings.sent5: The hoblike appearance of the rock formation was a natural wonder.

meanings.definition: In the manner of a hob.
meanings.sent1: He moved hoblike through the kitchen, checking on the simmering stew.
meanings.sent2: The dancer moved hoblike across the stage, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent3: The cat pounced hoblike on the toy mouse, thinking it was real.
meanings.sent4: The leaves rustled hoblike in the wind, creating a soothing sound.
meanings.sent5: She skipped hoblike down the path, humming a cheerful tune.
